Package ar.com.hjg.pngj.chunks

Contains the code related to chunk management for the PNGJ library.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ChunkHelper  
ChunkList All chunks that form an image, read or to be written chunks include all chunks, but IDAT is a single pseudo chunk without data
ChunkRaw Wraps the raw chunk data Short lived object, to be created while serialing/deserializing Do not reuse it for different chunks see http://www.libpng.org/pub/png/spec/1.2/PNG-Chunks.html
ChunksToWrite Chunks to be written - not including IDHR/ IDAT / END (buy yes PLTE) http://www.w3.org/TR/PNG/#table53

ChunkLoadBehaviour  
 

Package ar.com.hjg.pngj.chunks Description

Contains the code related to chunk management for the PNGJ library.

Only needed by client code if some special chunk handling is required.
